name: Narrowynn - The Forgotten Tale
description:
~Narrowynn~ The Forgotten Tale +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
  • A Faster paced First Person RPG.. 
  • Proof Of Concept Prototype
  • (ONLY, Main Goal, Find all the Gold) 
    Loot gather's at your house.

    Next update: ~ 5 days
    Last update >> Macintosh Build
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Give the Protoype a try.. And Don't Fall in the Alpha Well.

SPOILER: 

DON'T WATCH IF YOU WANNA GET THE GOLD IN THE OUTHOUSE

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

https://gfycat.com/fearlessglumdutchsmoushond

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Known Bugs / Noted Tweaks

  • -> It's still early so idk if you didn't get to it, or just its happening for some other reason but I talked to the stable girl, and can't get rid of the UI popup of "hello I'm the stable girl" (without going back to her and pressing E) (couldn't reproduce it)
This is a poorly implemented soon to be feature. You return your "dialog card" to farther the conversation. (All NPC should act this way.)
  •  -> Somehow, I can't collect the seocond gold bar the one where you go downstairs in the first house 
The second gold bar is the stashed gold from what you picked up upstairs. (If you return to this spot later you can watch it accumulate there.
  • -> Sprint (Shift only) is sometimes breaking I guess? Provides a small speed increase and then poof gone 
This is a Stamina system hidden by the fact the UI is still in developement. Your Dash also has it's own stamina system.
  • -> Can't scroll with mouse wheel 
Its press / not scroll. This is for your Dash. "Zoom zoom" Bad Pun in Tab Menu.
  • -> If I crouch and go inside a hut(which is too small) , I can stand up tall again when inside Improvements 
A ceiling check for the player is half written.
  • ->The sound on the blue lighting hut is a bit weird. 
Its press / not scroll. This is for your Dash. "Zoom zoom" Bad Pun in Tab Menu.
  • -> Some huts have 0 lighting.
Only buildings that have seen attention have been lit.
  •  -> A tree by the pier is hanging in the air :P 
Just one?
  • -> Need some activity in the village. (ignore this one if you already have it planned) 
Already planned.
  • -> More grass (imo, but I'm not that good at atmosphere ) 
Only a tenth of the trees have been placed. So its a work in progress.
  • -> The random "fireflies" im guessing is the term, are appearing in small translucent boxes. If the boxes are intended, make the boxes smaller imo
Half - ass implemented.. Will fix soon!
  •  -> The graveyard should be bigger
Agreed

 What I really liked! -

  • > The rabbit! 
  • ->The ghost/graveyard lighting/sound change
  • -> The Fires

Game-play Coming In Next Alpha Build.

[ Comments, Suggestions, Critiques.. ]  All Welcome!

Check out the,
Narrowynn Developement Trello Board

to watch for features and see whats being currently worked on..

// Comment down below with suggestions to see if they get added to the Creative side of things and, ofc always report the bugs. :(

// Thanks for playing..  and if you could please take the time to fill out the Feedback Survey!
